mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.account AS "account", a.student_name AS "studentName", a.passwd AS "passwd", a.sex AS "sex", a.identity AS "identity", a.file_id AS "fileId", a.issue_id AS "issueId", a.class_id AS "classId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_student( id, account, student_name, passwd, sex, identity, file_id, issue_id, class_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{account}, #{studentName}, #{passwd}, #{sex}, #{identity}, #{fileId}, #{issueId}, #{classId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_student SET student_name = #{studentName}, passwd = #{passwd}, sex = #{sex}, identity = #{identity}, file_id = #{fileId}, issue_id = #{issueId}, class_id = #{classId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
